      • allowDustyOutput

        public void allowDustyOutput(boolean allowDustyOutput)
        If output valus is less than 546 satoshis, it is dusty output If allowDustyOutput is true, this small value is accepted by client

      • setData

        public void setData(byte[] data)
             throws io.blocko.coinstack.exception.MalformedInputException
        Set data transfered using OP_RETURN for transaction. Maximum size of data payload is limited to 80 bytes. If allowLargePayload() is true, larger data is accepted by client.
        Parameters:
        data - data payload to be attached to transaction
        Throws:
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.MalformedInputException

      • allowLargePayload

        public boolean allowLargePayload()
        return allowLargePayload boolean

      • allowLargePayload

        public void allowLargePayload(boolean allowLargePayload)
        Maximum size of data payload is limited to 80 bytes. If allowLargePayload is true, larger data is accepted by client.
        Parameters:
        allowLargePayload - boolean option to set allowLargePayload.

      • setFee

        public void setFee(long fee)
            throws io.blocko.coinstack.exception.MalformedInputException
        Set transfer fee for transaction
        Parameters:
        fee - amount of fee to pay to miners (minimum 0.0001 BTC = 10000 satoshi)
        Throws:
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.MalformedInputException

      • shuffleOutputs

        public boolean shuffleOutputs()
        return shuffleOutputs boolean

      • shuffleOutputs

        public void shuffleOutputs(boolean shuffleOutputs)
        Set option whether to shuffle order of unspent outputs, for generating a transaction, or not In true (is default), the unspent outputs will be shuffled and used randomly. In other case, those will be used in a static way according to a response of a unspent output query
        Parameters:
        shuffleOutputs - true is enabling shuffle, false is disable (default = true)

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()

                               String privateKeyWIF)
                        throws IOException,
                               io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        IOException
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
